text:
Dreams dreams of when we had just started things
Dreams of me and you
It seems it seems like i can't shake this memories 
I wonder if you feel the same too
But i know he doesn't.... i never thought the man i loved the most would end up having the worst opinion about me but it happened....some people can't see the real you no matter how much of yourself you give to them....and its sad...cause i really loved him with all my soul﻿
author: karena apus
